summary: Adds 1 explosive arrow, 1 explosive bolt and 2 high damage bows that shoot many arrows.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds 1 explosive arrow, 1 explosive bolt and 2 high damage bows that shoot many arrows. All items must be spawned in through the command console.
Installation: Extract into Data folder
Items:
Explosive Arrow                        - "HE Shell (arrow)"
Explosive Crossbow Bolt        -  "HE Shell (bolt)"
Bow that shoots 10 arrows     - "Shell Launcher (x10)"
Bow that shoots 100 arrows  - "Shell Launcher (x100)"

_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
WARNING!
The bow that shoots 100 arrows will most likely crash your game
_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
author: Zylixus
